summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 226 W, page 15 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 300 Northeast Northgate Way from Midrise to Neighborhood Commercial 3/65'; and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Douglas Howe for Touchstone Development, C.F. 302803 Appl. 9802979)
